definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)

sentences.english: The rear seats are extremely comfortable and the L-shaped headrests improve the driver's rear view visibility.
sentences.chinese: 後座非常舒適的L型頭枕改善司機的後視能見度。

sentences.english: In bed , i rest my head on a soft pillow filled with feathers .
sentences.chinese: 躺在牀上，我將頭枕在柔軟的羽絨枕上。

sentences.english: Then she sat down and laid her head on Babs' arm.
sentences.chinese: 然後，她坐下來，把頭枕在芭布斯的胳膊上。

sentences.english: The child had laid her head on a stone and fallen asleep.
sentences.chinese: 孩子早已把頭枕在一塊石頭上睡着了。

sentences.english: Submission to the divine will is the softest pillow on which to recline.
sentences.chinese: 服從神的旨意是最柔軟的靠頭枕。

sentences.english: I approach the bed, lower myself beside her, and rest my head on the pillow next to hers.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我挪到了她身邊，把頭枕到她的臉頰旁。

sentences.english: Pillowed upon my fair love's ripening breast.
sentences.chinese: 以頭枕在愛人酥軟的胸脯上。

sentences.english: His head was pillowed on Mary's lap.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭枕在瑪麗的大腿上。

sentences.english: The headrest should also be adjusted in order to help facilitate good posture.
sentences.chinese: 該頭枕也應一併調整，以幫助促進良好的態勢。

sentences.english: The Economy Class cabin, features lightweight and slim design seats with four-way headrest.
sentences.chinese: 經濟客艙，設有四向頭枕輕巧纖薄的設計席位。

sentences.english: Inside, the cabin boasts black leather upholstery, yellow contrast stitching and embroidered headrests.
sentences.chinese: 車內配備黑色真皮內飾，黃色縫線及繡花頭枕。

sentences.english: The child pillowed his head on his mother's shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子把頭枕在母親的肩上。

sentences.english: They sit, hunter head rest, in the girl cherishes, fell asleep .
sentences.chinese: 他倆坐下去，獵人把頭枕在姑娘懷中，睡着了。

sentences.english: I am lying stretched outwith my head in her lap.
sentences.chinese: 而我呢則把頭枕在了她的膝蓋上。

sentences.english: He laid down his head upon his pillow to rest.
sentences.chinese: 他把頭枕在枕頭上休息。

sentences.english: Pillowed upon a fair and happy breast.
sentences.chinese: 一頭枕着柔美而幸福的胸脯。
